message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $12,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate. I believe it aligns well with your needs and expectations.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value of your product, $12,500 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for it. Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. I would like to counter your offer by suggesting we negotiate at $11,000 for the product. This still allows both parties to benefit from the transaction while considering your budget constraints.
